can some one please tell me how i get the graphic pack to work??.

Where to i add graphic pack file in the football manager??

i tried that you have wrote,but some how it dont work...

Please help,

Unzip "graphics" and "skins" to C:\Documents and Settings\user name\My Documents\Sports Interactive\Football Manager 2008

in preferences untick "use skin cache" and tick "always reload skin on confirm" and play!
 Enjoy!
